title: Sixteenth century differs from previous period

content.question: Which of the following most clearly differentiates the sixteenth century from the previous period in world history?

choices.label: Establishment of nation-states in the Americas
Extension of sugar production to the Americas

content.answer: Extension of sugar production to the Americas

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
